context: Long ago the bombs fell and the world ended. You are one of the few who is still alive. You are trying to survive by scavenging among the ruins of what is left behind.
first_story_block: You are standing outside an old rundown gas station at the edge of town. There are old broken cars surrounding the gas station and on the road. You are extremely hungry and haven't eaten in a few days.

action_results.action: look in the gas station for food.
action_results.result: You search the gas station for food, but find nothing you can eat.
You search the cars for food, you search three without success, but in the glove compartment of the fourth you find a box of crackers.

They remind you of when you needed to eat a bland diet after your operation. You pat yourself on where you remember the incision was made. The scar healed long ago, but the brain remembers. The crackers weren't very nutritious, but some fuel in the tank is better than none.

action_results.action: Continue to look for food in the building up ahead.
Look for water for hydration and to fool the stomach until ore food can be found.
Begin to walk towards the nearest town.
